[Title]
DFO-SCH NL Timber Supply
===============

**Notice No.** WS3838563900-Doc3838563957
**Pub. Date** 23 January 2023
**Tender Closing** 08 February 2023, 14:00 EST

**Open Tender Notice**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services on behalf of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans - Small Craft Harbours (DFO-SCH) seeks the supply of treated hemlock timber for its storage facility in Mt. Pearl, Newfoundland and Labrador.

**Contract Details**
-------------------

* Tender Reference Number: WS3838563900
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Procurement Category: Goods (GD)
* Procurement Method: Competitive Open Tendering
* Value: To be determined
* Decision Criteria: Lowest Price
* Regions of Delivery: Newfoundland and Labrador

**Scope of Work**
-----------------

The scope of this tender is to provide 310 pieces of treated hemlock timber (200 x 200 x 6100mm) to be delivered to DFO-SCH's storage facility in Mt. Pearl, Newfoundland and Labrador.

**Trade Agreements**
------------------

This tender is open to suppliers who meet the eligibility criteria under the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Contact Information**

For more information and to submit your bid, please visit the Discovery (Ariba Compendium) link: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15205702?extsite=MTUyMDU3MDJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

**Contact Information**

Adam Beaumaster (SPAC/PSPC)
adam.beaumaster@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
